Setting Hardware

Infrastructure tab captures the hardware and software specifications of the UCS manger that you intend to configure. On successfully creating the projects, you will be able to choose your hardware and its associated release.

To set your infrastructure, perform the following:

 1. Create a project. For more information on creating projects, refer to Creating Projects. The Hardware Setting screen appears.

Note If you have created a project earlier, select the Project and click the project. The Hardware Setting screen appears.

Figure 2-7 Hardware Setting

 2. Select the Fabric Interconnect from the drop-down list.

Currently, two Fabric Interconnect models are supported:

 • Cisco UCS 6248

 • Cisco UCS 6296

 3. Select the associated Software Release of the UCS Manager from the drop-down list. In this release version 2.2 is supported.

 4. Select the associated IO Module from the drop-down list. Supported IOM’s are 2204 and 2208.

 5. Click Save and Next to proceed.

Note You can Save and Exit at any point of the setup and resume the setup from that point.
